document_data.name: Pook
document_data.mainbody: '''Pook''' was a [[pasha]] and leader of the [[Pook guild]] in [[Calimport]], the capital of [[Calimshan]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1356}}, he ordered [[Artemis Entreri]], "Pasha Pook's prime [[assassin]]", to retrieve an enchanted [[ruby pendant]] back from the [[halfling]] [[Regis]] who'd stolen it.<ref>
document_data.Possessions: Pook was briefly given [[Drizzt Do'Urden|Drizzt]]'s magic panther, [[Guenhwyvar]], as a token from Artemis Entreri, as he had a love of exotic [[cat]]s. He also had a dangerous ''[[portal]]'' to other realms called the [[Taros Hoop]].
document_data.Relationships: He made many allies to increase his power and influence in Calimport. One example was the [[wererat]] guild led by [[Rassiter]]. He also had various contacts outside Calimport that he employed for various missions such as the wizard [[Oberon (wizard)|Oberon]] and the pirate [[Pinochet]].
document_data.Home: Pook lived in a villa known as [[Pook's Palace]] until his death in [[1357 DR]]. The estate was located in Sarkh Drudach of Sholeh Sabban in the [[Calimport/Khanduq Ward|Khanduq Ward]] of Calimport.
document_data.Description: Pasha Pook was tall, muscular, and fancily dressed.
